casebody.data:
New York Public Interest Research Group, Inc., et al., Appellants, v Hugh L. Carey, as Governor of the State of New York, et al., Respondents. Submitted March 28, 1977; decided May 3, 1977

Reported below, 55 AD2d 274.

Motion to dismiss the appeal herein granted and the appeal dismissed, without costs, for mootness.
